website_summaries.verdict: Numerous extras and options, like top- or bottom-only wash, are attractive pluses for this dishwasher.
pros: Extra silverware rack is a nice bonus
Fast cleaning cycles, from under an hour for express to just over 2 hours for full cycles
cons: Really baked-on gunk may not completely come off in regular wash cycle

customer_reviews.title: Best dish washer I have ever owned!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had read peoples reviews about it not drying but it drys great for me I have it on sanitize and it does a great job of cleaning (without having to pre-clean ), drying and I can also control if upper, lower or both wash with a press if a button... Pay the extra money for installing or have a plumber do it if not well ya might have to replace the flooring (I really should have had it installed but I learned the hard way lol make sure you by the universal kit as well for the hoses might not line up exactly BETTER SAFE THAN SORRY!!!
customer_reviews.author: deathdiver

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Great looking appliance! Very clean lines And modern looking. I can barely hear it while it's running.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Towey

customer_reviews.title: This dishwasher sucked even before it broke
customer_reviews.text: You know how sometimes the moment you buy something you realize it was a mistake? That was this dishwasher. it was so self-evidently poorly made, and now, 85 days after we bought it-- it's broken because a piece cracked off of the housing, the door has come loose and other absolute nonsense. I can't wait to get this piece of crap out of our house. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Mann, III

customer_reviews.title: I hate this dishwasher piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap! Had to have a repair man out three times! The third time was to replace a leaking valve that ruined my kitchen floors and got my cupboards, walls wet as well. My homeowners insurance is now involved. Beware this is NOT worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: it just fell from the machine like a dead leaf from a branch
customer_reviews.text: An important part inside our 13 month old GE dishwasher fell off inside the machine. It didn’t break; it just fell from the machine like a dead leaf from a branch. A metaphor for the company itself. I would rather do dishes by hand than hand GE another dollar. Plastic. Junk. Rip-off.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Weil

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this dishwasher, after cleaning the filter ...
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this dishwasher, after cleaning the filter and cleaning the dishes there were small particles and sometimes chunks on or around my dishes, also, I have to manually dry every spoon, fork, bowl, ect... when I told the rep she said " maybe you should get jet dry or something "
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Very nice :)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace an older model. I am impressed with how quiet and easy it is to use. The buttons are hidden beneath the cabinet in my case the counter extends. I like that because kids can't even see where the buttons are when they visit. I almost always use the auto sensor to wash dishes. So far I have only pre washed things with larger pieces of food and I have not had to rewash anything yet. I would definitely buy this item again, but I would order the universal dishwasher install kit because we had to get a hose to reach the sink drain.
customer_reviews.author: Lildear

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't drain properly and ruined my floor.
customer_reviews.text: Previous owner installed this in my home before the sale. It worked for about a month, then the drain stopped working. Technicians replaced the drain pump, but it kept leaking. My floor is ruined from the water damage, and the repairs will cost more than the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W W

customer_reviews.title: worst dishwasher ever for one reason
customer_reviews.text: this is the worst dish washer i have ever owned for one reason...it has NO LOCK! It opens by itself ALL the time thereby stopping the entire cycle and beeping until a chair is place in front of it (so that it stays shut). it can have every wonderful gadget on the menu screen in the world but if it never stays shut....it will drive you mad. save your sanity and don't buy. after about a year it began opening itself.
customer_reviews.author: TellingtheWorld

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in Lowes in Oct, 2016 and it broken after months. After they came 3 time and last more than one months, it was finally fixed. But now it is broken again after one and half year. I am really disappointed by its quality.
customer_reviews.author: jinhua wu

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY GE ANYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely junk. Used it 5 times and died. I had it in a box for a few months while remodeling my kitchen. When it does it was out of warranty and GE sent me a new controller board, nothing. Wanted to charge me $185 to come troubleshoot it, not repair. Used only 5 times. Been a fan of GE for many years. Never AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Drummond

product_meta.title: GE GDT545PSJSS 24" Stainless Steel Fully Integrated Dishwasher - Energy Star
product_meta.description: Fully Integrated Dishwasher with 4 Wash Cycles, 8 Wash Options, 16 Place Setting Capacity, Piranha Hard Food Disposer, Steam Pre-Wash, Wash Zones, Silverware Basket, Silence Rating of 51 dBA and Energy Star Rated

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.4 out of 5 stars13 ratings2.4 out of 5 stars
